original_text: For the flesh desires what is contrary to the Spirit, and the Spirit what is contrary to the flesh. They are in conflict with each other, so that you are not to do whatever you want.
korean_text: 육체의 소욕은 성령을 거스르고 성령은 육체를 거스르나니 이 둘이 서로 대적함으로 너희가 원하는 것을 하지 못하게 하려 함이니라

sentences.original_text: For the flesh desires what is contrary to the Spirit
and the Spirit what is contrary to the flesh
They are in conflict with each other
so that you are not to do whatever you want
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 원하는 것을 하지 못하게 하려 함이라
